title: STOP letting UNRANKD players Queue up with there silver or gold friends PLEASE!!!!!!
body:
No sure if anyone else is feeling the same way i am, but i have lost 3 promotions in the last 2 days because of ppl duo with there unranked friends, i am currently only in Silver 3, but those unranked players only have like 2 or 3 ranked games under there belt and gets absolutely slaughted by the ppl they are facing, they should not allow to DUO untill they have at least play there 10 games, at least ROIT will MMR them correctly, it's is just so unfair !!!! what is the reason behind letting unranks queue with there high rank friends? it's kind of letting them cheat or stuff other peoples games!!!! 

look at how unfair my attached photo is in my last promo match and off cause mid fed like crazy and we lost, but how is this kind of match up even possible :(

replies.body: Unranked players i believe have 1200 MMR that like mid silver so u gotta deal with it
but i think it's only fair for them to do there 10 games solo first to get a better indication. and not stuff up anyone else games

But who do they play against?
The numbers for a separate placement queue is TOO LOW for this to be viable.

Also, if you feel it is unfair to play with unranked in silver, how are games with 10 unranked any fairer?
You are just concentrating the skill disparity rather than dispersing it as is achieved through the current system.

Unfortunately unranked MMR is where you are sitting. 
So in your picture, the two players are approx. at the same MMR, not playing with a higher MMR friend.
You need to climb before you can avoid these players. 

However I also think the entry MMR should be lower to mid Bronze.
so you are saying all newbies start in silver........... so what are bronze for then :(

oh sweety, poor you :'(

**Guess what? Your mid was doing their re-placements and was actually silver last season so still has the same mmr. ** (they weren't duo with someone)

New players have a silver MMR to begin with, so those who are worth will have an easier time to get placed in a higher division (one that they deserve) instead of having to try and carry a bronze five game. MMR adjustments are heavy in the first couple of games, so those who aren't worthy get dropped to bronze level and don't impact on silver games as much.

But what if we don't want to be placed in Bronze?
I've done two of my placements. Duoing with higher MMR lowers the chance of being placed in Bronze, since ultimately it's based on the overall MMR of who is in each of your placement games.

Then again, I think I'm hot shit, since ranked went down last season I've been playing heaps of matches with Plats, Diamonds and Master Tier players.
[Insert obligatory "I'm bronze but deserve challenger" here]
